metadata.title: CVE-2015-7576 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The http_basic_authenticate_with method inactionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/http_authentication.rb in the BasicAuthentication implementation in Action Controller in Ruby on Rails before3.2.22.1, 4.0.x and 4.1.x before 4.1.14.1, 4.2.x before 4.2.5.1, and 5.xbefore 5.0.0.beta1.1 does not use a constant-time algorithm for verifyingcredentials, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypassauthentication by measuring timing differences.

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
